trans-unit.resname: STA·1 | Approach of the Second Sun | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Approach of the Second Sun
trans-unit.target: 神日迫临

trans-unit.resname: STA·1 | Approach of the Second Sun | Card Text
trans-unit.source: If this spell was cast from your hand and you've cast another spell named Approach of the Second Sun this game, you win the game. Otherwise, put Approach of the Second Sun into its owner's library seventh from the top and you gain 7 life.
trans-unit.target: 如果此咒语是从你手上施放，且你本盘游戏中施放过另一个名称为神日迫临的咒语，则你赢得这盘游戏。若否，则将神日迫临置于其拥有者牌库顶数来第七张的位置，且你获得7点生命。

trans-unit.resname: STA·2 | Day of Judgment | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Day of Judgment
trans-unit.target: 审判末日

trans-unit.resname: STA·2 | Day of Judgment | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Destroy all creatures.
trans-unit.target: 消灭所有生物。

trans-unit.resname: STA·2 | Day of Judgment | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "This must not become common knowledge. The consequences of such a spell are too great. Lock it away in the restricted archive, and destroy its record in the catalog."\n—Director Taiva, to Isabough
trans-unit.target: 「这绝不能成为公共知识。此类咒语后果难以收拾。务必将其锁入受限文库，并销毁目录中的记载。」 ～泰瓦馆长叮嘱伊瑟伯

trans-unit.source: Defiant Strike
trans-unit.target: 无畏挥击

trans-unit.resname: STA·3 | Defiant Strike | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 目标生物得+1/+0直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: STA·3 | Defiant Strike | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: "For twelve days and twelve nights, Somat assailed the monster's shell. On the thirteenth morning, it cracked with the dawn."\n—*Heroics: A Book of Fables*
trans-unit.target: 「索马特不断敲击怪物甲壳，十二昼十二夜间从未中断。到了第十三天清晨，甲壳终于裂出曙光。」 ～*《勇行故事：寓言合辑》*

trans-unit.source: Divine Gambit
trans-unit.target: 神圣计策

trans-unit.source: Exile target artifact, creature, or enchantment an opponent controls. That player may put a permanent card from their hand onto the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 放逐目标由对手操控的神器，生物或结界。该牌手可以将一张永久物牌从其手上放进战场。

trans-unit.source: "Evil is to be unshackled, not slain. Unlock your foe and release the miracle within."\n—Keevan, docent of Kollema Hall
trans-unit.target: 「邪恶需要释放，而非消灭。解开封印敌人的枷锁，展现其中的惊人奇迹。」 ～科玛学堂讲师基万

trans-unit.source: Ephemerate
trans-unit.target: 流光烁影

trans-unit.source: Exile target creature you control, then return it to the battlefield under its owner's control.
trans-unit.target: 放逐目标由你操控的生物，然后将它在其拥有者的操控下移回战场。

trans-unit.source: Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)
trans-unit.target: 弹回（如果你从你手上施放此咒语，于它结算时将之放逐。在你的下一个维持开始时，你可以从放逐区施放此牌，且不需支付其法术力费用。）

trans-unit.resname: STA·6 | Gift of Estates | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Gift of Estates
trans-unit.target: 献地

trans-unit.resname: STA·6 | Gift of Estates | Card Text
trans-unit.source: If an opponent controls more lands than you, search your library for up to three Plains cards, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle.
trans-unit.target: 如果某对手操控的地比你多，则从你的牌库中搜寻至多三张平原牌，展示这些牌，将它们置于你手上，然后洗牌。

trans-unit.resname: STA·6 | Gift of Estates | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "We asked for a home and received the world."\n—*Scroll of Nine Blessings*
trans-unit.target: 「我们祈求一处家园，却得到了整个世界。」 ～*《九福卷轴》*

trans-unit.source: Gods Willing
trans-unit.target: 众神意旨

trans-unit.resname: STA·7 | Gods Willing | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target creature you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn. (It can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, enchanted, or equipped by anything of that color.)
trans-unit.target: 选择一种颜色。目标由你操控的生物获得反该色保护异能直到回合结束。（它不能被该色的东西阻挡、指定为目标、造成伤害、结附或是装备。）

trans-unit.resname: STA·7 | Gods Willing | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Scry 1.
trans-unit.target: 占卜1。

trans-unit.source: Mana Tithe
trans-unit.target: 魔力什一税

trans-unit.source: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}.
trans-unit.target: 除非目标咒语的操控者支付{1}，否则反击之。

trans-unit.source: "The tyrant's bellow of rage trailed off into a whimper as the last of his fortune escaped his grasp."\n—*The Dethroner's Grimoire*
trans-unit.target: 「眼见最后一丝财富逐渐抽离手中，暴君的愤怒狂啸也慢慢变成低声啜泣。」 ～*《逆臣秘录》*

trans-unit.source: Revitalize
trans-unit.target: 再现活力

trans-unit.source: You gain 3 life.
trans-unit.target: 你获得3点生命。

trans-unit.source: Draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: "Knight Kathryn closed her eyes, bracing herself for the end. When she opened them again, she stood triumphant over her foe."\n—Thadus the Healer, *Memoirs*
trans-unit.target: 「骑士凯萨琳闭紧双眼，准备好迎接生命最终时刻。但当她再次睁开时，却发现是她对手倒在脚下。」 ～治疗师萨都丝，*《回忆录》*

trans-unit.resname: STA·10 | Swords to Plowshares | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Swords to Plowshares
trans-unit.target: 化剑为犁

trans-unit.resname: STA·10 | Swords to Plowshares | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Exile target creature. Its controller gains life equal to its power.
trans-unit.target: 放逐目标生物。其操控者获得等同于其力量的生命。

trans-unit.resname: STA·10 | Swords to Plowshares | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The blademaster turned his fury to his new foes: root rot and cabbage slugs."\n—*Myths and Miracles, Vol. VII*
trans-unit.target: 「大剑师转而将怒火发泄在新的敌人身上：腐根和菜虫。」 ～*《神话与奇迹》，卷七*

trans-unit.source: Teferi's Protection
trans-unit.target: 泰菲力的庇护

trans-unit.resname: STA·11 | Teferi's Protection | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Until your next turn, your life total can't change and you gain protection from everything. All permanents you control phase out. (While they're phased out, they're treated as though they don't exist. They phase in before you untap during your untap step.)
trans-unit.target: 直到你的下一个回合，你的总生命不会改变，且你获得反一切保护异能。所有由你操控的永久物跃离。（它们在跃离期间视作不存在。于你的重置步骤中重置之前，它们跃回。）

trans-unit.resname: STA·11 | Teferi's Protection | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Exile Teferi's Protection.
trans-unit.target: 放逐泰菲力的庇护。

trans-unit.resname: STA·12 | Blue Sun's Zenith | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Blue Sun's Zenith
trans-unit.target: 蓝阳当空

trans-unit.resname: STA·12 | Blue Sun's Zenith | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Target player draws X cards. Shuffle Blue Sun's Zenith into its owner's library.
trans-unit.target: 目标牌手抓X张牌。将蓝阳当空洗入其拥有者的牌库。

trans-unit.resname: STA·12 | Blue Sun's Zenith | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Five suns! Can you even imagine how complicated the orbital calculations must be? What I wouldn't give to tackle an equation like that!"\n—Zimone, Quandrix mage-student
trans-unit.target: 「五个太阳！你能想象这样轨道计算会有多复杂吗？真希望我能去处理这样的算式！」 ～量析修习法师琦梦

trans-unit.source: Brainstorm
trans-unit.target: 脑力激荡

trans-unit.source: Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order.
trans-unit.target: 抓三张牌，然后将两张牌从你手上以任意顺序置于你的牌库顶。

trans-unit.source: "Infinite ideas flow through the Multiverse, waiting for an open mind."\n—*The Biblioplex: An Introduction*
trans-unit.target: 「无数思绪在多重宇宙中流动，只待开明思想前去发现。」 ～*《茂典阁志：前言》*

trans-unit.source: Compulsive Research
trans-unit.target: 强制探寻

trans-unit.source: Target player draws three cards. Then that player discards two cards unless they discard a land card.
trans-unit.target: 目标牌手抓三张牌。然后除非该牌手弃一张地牌，否则其弃两张牌。

trans-unit.source: "Every Planeswalker remembers the first time their mind touched the staggering vastness of the Multiverse."\n—Kasmina
trans-unit.target: 「当思绪首度触碰广袤多重宇宙时感到的震撼，相信每位鹏洛客都不会忘记。」 ～克蜜娜

trans-unit.source: Counterspell
trans-unit.target: 反击咒语

trans-unit.source: Counter target spell.
trans-unit.target: 反击目标咒语。

trans-unit.source: "One need not know the specific details of a spell to suppress its effect. Simply rearrange the rules of the reality within which the spell operates."\n—Imbraham, Quandrix dean
trans-unit.target: 「至于压制咒语效果的具体细节也不用去了解。只需重新整理咒语作用实界内的规则就可实现。」 ～量析院长英巴罕

trans-unit.source: Memory Lapse
trans-unit.target: 记忆丧失

trans-unit.source: Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, put it on top of its owner's library instead of into that player's graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 反击目标咒语。如果以此法反击该咒语，则改为将它置于其拥有者的牌库顶，而非置入该牌手的坟墓场。

trans-unit.source: "Where do our forgotten thoughts go? I knew once, but I can't remember."\n—Director Taiva, journal entry
trans-unit.target: 「那些遗忘的思绪都去到了哪里？我曾探见其踪迹，但也无从记起。」 ～泰瓦馆长，日志一笔

trans-unit.source: Mind's Desire
trans-unit.target: 心之所欲

trans-unit.resname: STA·17 | Mind's Desire | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Shuffle your library. Then exile the top card of your library. Until end of turn, you may play that card without paying its mana cost.
trans-unit.target: 将你的牌库洗牌。然后放逐你的牌库顶牌。直到回合结束，你可以使用该牌且不需支付其法术力费用。

trans-unit.resname: STA·17 | Mind's Desire | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn.)
trans-unit.target: 风暴（当施放此咒语时，本回合于它之前每施放过一个咒语，便将此咒语复制一次。）

trans-unit.source: Negate
trans-unit.target: 失效

trans-unit.source: Counter target noncreature spell.
trans-unit.target: 反击目标非生物咒语。

trans-unit.source: "Shatter your opponent's spell with enough force, and you'll shatter their confidence with it."\n—*Tome of Obstructions*, marginalia
trans-unit.target: 「用足够的力量粉碎对手的咒语，还能一并粉碎对手的信心。」 ～*《障法巨著》*，旁批

trans-unit.source: Opt
trans-unit.target: 抉择

trans-unit.source: Scry 1.
trans-unit.target: 占卜1。

trans-unit.source: Draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: "The wish most often granted is the wish to choose one's own destiny."\n—*Aethershrine*, inscription
trans-unit.target: 「最常被保佑的愿望，都是希冀能选择自身命运者。」 ～*《乙太祭祠》*，铭文

trans-unit.source: Strategic Planning
trans-unit.target: 战略计划

trans-unit.source: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 检视你牌库顶的三张牌。将其中一张置于你手上，其余的牌则置入你的坟墓场。

trans-unit.source: "I can offer only information, young one. What path you choose is up to you."\n—Jadzi, Oracle of Arcavios
trans-unit.target: 「年轻人，我只能提供信息。至于要走哪条路得你自己选。」 ～阿凯维沃圣法谕贾琦

trans-unit.source: Tezzeret's Gambit
trans-unit.target: 泰兹瑞的计策

trans-unit.resname: STA·21 | Tezzeret's Gambit | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: ({U/P} can be paid with either {U} or 2 life.)
trans-unit.target: （{U/P}可用{U}或2点生命来支付。）

trans-unit.resname: STA·21 | Tezzeret's Gambit | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Draw two cards, then proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)
trans-unit.target: 抓两张牌，然后增殖。（选择任意数量的永久物和／或牌手，然后为其已有之每种指示物各多放置一个同类的指示物。）

trans-unit.source: Time Warp
trans-unit.target: 时间弯曲

trans-unit.source: Target player takes an extra turn after this one.
trans-unit.target: 目标牌手在本回合后进行额外的一个回合。

trans-unit.source: "Chronomancers have a rather different definition of living in the moment."\n—*The Millennium Tome*
trans-unit.target: 「不同时间术士对于『活在当下』的定义各不相同。」 ～*《千年巨著》*

trans-unit.source: Whirlwind Denial
trans-unit.target: 疾风拒斥

trans-unit.source: For each spell and ability your opponents control, counter it unless its controller pays {4}.
trans-unit.target: 对每个由对手操控的咒语或异能而言，除非其操控者支付{4}，否则反击之。

trans-unit.source: "If they try to storm your palace, you must become the storm."\n—*Handbook of Imperial Spellcraft*
trans-unit.target: 「如果他们想要如风暴般强袭你的宫殿，那你就必须化身风暴。」 ～*《皇家咒艺手册》*

trans-unit.source: Agonizing Remorse
trans-unit.target: 苦痛悔恨

trans-unit.source: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it or a card from their graveyard. Exile that card. You lose 1 life.
trans-unit.target: 目标对手展示其手牌。你从其手上选择一张非地牌或从其坟墓场中选择一张牌。放逐该牌。你失去1点生命。

trans-unit.source: "Guilt is not absolution. Regret is not justice. But it is right that you suffer."\n—Extus Narr
trans-unit.target: 「内疚不是解脱。后悔也非正义。但你理应受苦。」 ～埃陀斯纳尔

trans-unit.resname: STA·25 | Crux of Fate | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Crux of Fate
trans-unit.target: 命途交错

trans-unit.resname: STA·25 | Crux of Fate | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Choose one —
trans-unit.target: 选择一项～

trans-unit.resname: STA·25 | Crux of Fate | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: • Destroy all Dragon creatures.
trans-unit.target: •消灭所有龙生物。

trans-unit.resname: STA·25 | Crux of Fate | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: • Destroy all non-Dragon creatures.
trans-unit.target: •消灭所有非龙生物。

trans-unit.resname: STA·25 | Crux of Fate | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "One brother fought for the sake of the Multiverse. The other for himself."\n—*The Elderspell Parable*
trans-unit.target: 「兄弟争斗：一位心系多重宇宙，另一位只为自身称雄。」 ～*《至尊咒寓言》*

trans-unit.source: Dark Ritual
trans-unit.target: 黑暗祭礼

trans-unit.source: Add {B}{B}{B}.
"They distrust my methods, but when they want results, whom do you think they seek?"\n—*Incantations of Lim-Dûl*
trans-unit.target: 「他们不相信我的方法，但当他们想要结果时，你猜又会去找谁？」 ～*《林杜咒文集》*

trans-unit.source: Demonic Tutor
trans-unit.target: 邪魔导师

trans-unit.source: Search your library for a card, put that card into your hand, then shuffle.
trans-unit.target: 从你的牌库中搜寻一张牌，将该牌置于你手上，然后洗牌。

trans-unit.source: "Demons prefer to deal with those who believe themselves too wise to be fooled."\n—Scroll case inscription
trans-unit.target: 「自以为绝顶聪明不会受骗者，正是恶魔青睐的交易对手。」 ～卷轴盒铭文

trans-unit.source: Doom Blade
trans-unit.target: 送终刀锋

trans-unit.source: Destroy target nonblack creature.
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标非黑色的生物。

trans-unit.source: "An angel can shine like the sun, inspire the weak, and even threaten victory over darkness. But in the end it matters not, for it still dies like any other pest."\n—Ob Nixilis
trans-unit.target: 「天使能如阳光耀世，能鼓舞弱者，甚至可能战胜黑暗。但最终这一切都不重要，因为他们也会像害虫般死去。」 ～欧尼希兹

trans-unit.source: Duress
trans-unit.target: 逼从

trans-unit.source: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. That player discards that card.
trans-unit.target: 目标对手展示其手牌。你选择其中一张非生物且非地的牌。该牌手弃掉该牌。

trans-unit.source: "Magic brought peace to the Vastlands but was soon corrupted."\n—*The Mystic Age: A Saga of Spells*
trans-unit.target: 「魔法曾给过旷土和平，但很快就被腐化。」 ～*《神秘时代：咒法传》*

trans-unit.source: Eliminate
trans-unit.target: 涤除

trans-unit.source: Destroy target creature or planeswalker with mana value 3 or less.
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标法术力值等于或小于3的生物或鹏洛客。

trans-unit.source: "It takes so little energy to erase a person. It's almost like the universe doesn't care that they existed at all."\n—Extus Narr
trans-unit.target: 「彻底抹除一个人根本不费什么工夫。看似宇宙根本不在乎他们是否存在。」 ～埃陀斯纳尔

trans-unit.resname: STA·31 | Inquisition of Kozilek | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Inquisition of Kozilek
trans-unit.target: 寇基雷的审讯

trans-unit.resname: STA·31 | Inquisition of Kozilek | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Target player reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it with mana value 3 or less. That player discards that card.
trans-unit.target: 目标牌手展示其手牌。你选择其中一张法术力值等于或小于3的非地牌。该牌手弃掉该牌。

trans-unit.resname: STA·31 | Inquisition of Kozilek | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "To dwell within the Blind Eternities is unthinkable. To encounter those who do could shatter the mind."\n—*Chronicle of the Titans*
trans-unit.target: 「深居黑暗虚空，此事根本无法想象：面会其间生灵，思绪便遭粉碎。」 ～*《巨物编年史》*

trans-unit.resname: STA·32 | Sign in Blood | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sign in Blood
trans-unit.target: 以血立契

trans-unit.resname: STA·32 | Sign in Blood | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Target player draws two cards and loses 2 life.
trans-unit.target: 目标牌手抓两张牌并失去2点生命。

trans-unit.resname: STA·32 | Sign in Blood | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "It's always my brightest students who make the worst decisions."\n—Shaile, Silverquill dean
trans-unit.target: 「作出最糟糕决定的，总是我那帮最聪明的学生。」 ～银毫院长莎依儿

trans-unit.source: Tainted Pact
trans-unit.target: 腐败协定

trans-unit.source: Exile the top card of your library. You may put that card into your hand unless it has the same name as another card exiled this way. Repeat this process until you put a card into your hand or you exile two cards with the same name, whichever comes first.
trans-unit.target: 放逐你的牌库顶牌。除非它与另一张以此法放逐的牌同名，否则你可以将该牌置于你手上。重复此流程，直到你将某张牌置于你手上，或是你放逐了两张同名的牌为止。

trans-unit.resname: STA·34 | Tendrils of Agony | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Tendrils of Agony
trans-unit.target: 苦痛卷须

trans-unit.resname: STA·34 | Tendrils of Agony | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target player loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
trans-unit.target: 目标牌手失去2点生命，且你获得2点生命。

trans-unit.resname: STA·34 | Tendrils of Agony | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn. You may choose new targets for the copies.)
trans-unit.target: 风暴（当施放此咒语时，本回合于它之前每施放过一个咒语，便将此咒语复制一次。你可以为每个复制品选择新的目标。）

trans-unit.source: Village Rites
trans-unit.target: 村民仪式

trans-unit.resname: STA·35 | Village Rites | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
trans-unit.target: 牺牲一个生物，以作为施放此咒语的额外费用。

trans-unit.resname: STA·35 | Village Rites | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Draw two cards.
trans-unit.target: 抓两张牌。

trans-unit.source: "My colleagues revile the barbarity of the Blood Age, but I believe we have much to learn from the magics of endless war."\n—Embrose, Silverquill dean
trans-unit.target: 「虽然同僚都厌恶去研究血腥时代的野蛮暴行，但我相信那段无尽战乱时期的魔法有很多值得我们学习。」 ～银毫院长安博斯

trans-unit.source: Chaos Warp
trans-unit.target: 混沌歪曲

trans-unit.source: The owner of target permanent shuffles it into their library, then reveals the top card of their library. If it's a permanent card, they put it onto the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 选择目标永久物。其拥有者将它洗入其牌库，然后展示其牌库顶牌。如果该牌是永久物牌，则该牌手将它放进战场。

trans-unit.source: "Be careful when handling old magical trinkets. You never know who they've been."\n—Augusta, Lorehold dean
trans-unit.target: 「处理古老魔法物品时请务必当心。你不会知道它们曾经是什么。」 ～衡鉴院长欧歌塔

trans-unit.resname: STA·37 | Claim the Firstborn | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Claim the Firstborn
trans-unit.target: 索求初婴

trans-unit.resname: STA·37 | Claim the Firstborn | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Gain control of target creature with mana value 3 or less until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 获得目标法术力值等于或小于3的生物之操控权直到回合结束。重置该生物。它获得敏捷异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: STA·37 | Claim the Firstborn | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Will! They have a copy of *Tales of the Fae* here! Want me to read you a bedtime story?"\n—Rowan Kenrith
trans-unit.target: 「威尔！他们这有本*《仙儿传说》*！要我给你读段睡前故事吗？」 ～萝婉肯理斯

trans-unit.source: Faithless Looting
trans-unit.target: 丧信掠夺

trans-unit.resname: STA·38 | Faithless Looting | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Draw two cards, then discard two cards.
trans-unit.target: 抓两张牌，然后弃两张牌。

trans-unit.resname: STA·38 | Faithless Looting | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Flashback {2}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
trans-unit.target: 返照{2}{R}（你可以从你的坟墓场施放此牌，并支付其返照费用，然后将它放逐。）

trans-unit.source: "How did you get your hands on that? Wait, never mind. I don't want to know."\n—Plargg, Lorehold dean
trans-unit.target: 「你是怎么拿到那东西的？算了，没事。我也不想知道。」 ～衡鉴院长帕葛

trans-unit.source: Grapeshot
trans-unit.target: 霰散弹

trans-unit.source: Grapeshot deals 1 damage to any target.
trans-unit.target: 霰散弹对任意一个目标造成1点伤害。

trans-unit.source: Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn. You may choose new targets for the copies.)
trans-unit.target: 风暴（当施放此咒语时，本回合于它之前每施放过一个咒语，便将此咒语复制一次。你可以为每个复制品选择新的目标。）

trans-unit.source: Increasing Vengeance
trans-unit.target: 报复渐增

trans-unit.resname: STA·40 | Increasing Vengeance | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Copy target instant or sorcery spell you control. If this spell was cast from a graveyard, copy that spell twice instead. You may choose new targets for the copies.
trans-unit.target: 复制目标由你操控的瞬间或法术咒语。如果此咒语是从坟墓场中施放，则改为将该咒语复制两次。你可以为每个复制品选择新的目标。

trans-unit.resname: STA·40 | Increasing Vengeance | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Flashback {3}{R}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
trans-unit.target: 返照{3}{R}{R}（你可以从你的坟墓场施放此牌，并支付其返照费用，然后将它放逐。）

trans-unit.source: Infuriate
trans-unit.target: 触怒

trans-unit.source: Target creature gets +3/+2 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 目标生物得+3/+2直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: "Some mages duel using intricate spellcraft and superior tactics. Others just get really, really mad."\n—*Secrets of the Feradorn Sorcerers*
trans-unit.target: 「有些法师是靠繁复咒语或超凡战术来赢得决斗。还有些就只是靠变得非常、非常狂暴。」 ～*《法拉东术士秘辛》*

trans-unit.source: Lightning Bolt
trans-unit.target: 闪电击

trans-unit.source: Lightning Bolt deals 3 damage to any target.
trans-unit.target: 闪电击对任意一个目标造成3点伤害。

trans-unit.source: "The first mages witnessed the fury of the raging storm and wished to answer back."\n—*The Stormwright Texts*
trans-unit.target: 「原初法师曾亲眼见证翻腾风暴的怒火，并希冀能够对等回应。」 ～*《造风师手记》*

trans-unit.source: Mizzix's Mastery
trans-unit.target: 米捷兹的精研

trans-unit.resname: STA·43 | Mizzix's Mastery | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Exile target card that's an instant or sorcery from your graveyard. For each card exiled this way, copy it, and you may cast the copy without paying its mana cost. Exile Mizzix's Mastery.
trans-unit.target: 将目标在你坟墓场中且为瞬间或法术的牌放逐。对每张以此法放逐的牌而言，将其复制，你可以施放该复制品，且不需支付其法术力费用。放逐米捷兹的精研。

trans-unit.resname: STA·43 | Mizzix's Mastery | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Overload {5}{R}{R}{R} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change "target" in its text to "each.")
trans-unit.target: 超载{5}{R}{R}{R}（你可以支付此咒语的超载费用来施放它。如果你如此作，将其中的「目标」字样全部更改为「每张」。）

trans-unit.source: Shock
trans-unit.target: 电震

trans-unit.source: Shock deals 2 damage to any target.
trans-unit.target: 电震对任意一个目标造成2点伤害。

trans-unit.source: "To this day, I have no idea if the heavens were obeying him or attacking him."\n—Ral Zarek, research notes
trans-unit.target: 「时至今日，我都还没弄清楚上天是在顺他的心，还是逆他的意。」 ～拉尔查雷克，研究纪录

trans-unit.source: Stone Rain
trans-unit.target: 石雨

trans-unit.source: Destroy target land.
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标地。

trans-unit.source: "Thus, Bruk the Skyhammer earned his epithet and won the war, all in one fiery moment."\n—*Compendium of Warspells*
trans-unit.target: 「最后，布鲁克就凭着这火热一击，一举将天降巨锤的名号和最终胜利都收入囊中。」 ～*《战争咒纲要》*

trans-unit.resname: STA·46 | Thrill of Possibility | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Thrill of Possibility
trans-unit.target: 快意拼搏

trans-unit.resname: STA·46 | Thrill of Possibility | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card.
trans-unit.target: 弃一张牌，以作为施放此咒语的额外费用。

trans-unit.resname: STA·46 | Thrill of Possibility | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Draw two cards.
trans-unit.target: 抓两张牌。

trans-unit.resname: STA·46 | Thrill of Possibility | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "If the prospect of what could be doesn't electrify you to your core, why attend Strixhaven at all?"\n—Nassari, Prismari dean
trans-unit.target: 「如果未来前景都无法从心底打动你，那又何必要来斯翠海文？」 ～粹丽院长纳撒理

trans-unit.source: Urza's Rage
trans-unit.target: 克撒之怒

trans-unit.resname: STA·47 | Urza's Rage | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Kicker {8}{R} (You may pay an additional {8}{R} as you cast this spell.)
trans-unit.target: 增幅{8}{R}（你施放此咒语时可以额外支付{8}{R}。）

trans-unit.resname: STA·47 | Urza's Rage | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: This spell can't be countered.
trans-unit.target: 此咒语不能被反击。

trans-unit.resname: STA·47 | Urza's Rage | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Urza's Rage deals 3 damage to any target. If this spell was kicked, instead it deals 10 damage to that permanent or player and the damage can't be prevented.
trans-unit.target: 克撒之怒对任意一个目标造成3点伤害。如果此咒语已增幅，则改为它对该永久物或牌手造成10点伤害，且此伤害不能被防止。

trans-unit.source: Abundant Harvest
trans-unit.target: 丰足收成

trans-unit.source: Choose land or nonland. Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a card of the chosen kind. Put that card into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
trans-unit.target: 选择地或非地。从你的牌库顶开始展示牌，直到展示出一张该种类的牌为止。将该牌置于你手上，其余则以随机顺序置于你的牌库底。

trans-unit.source: Adventurous Impulse
trans-unit.target: 冒险冲动

trans-unit.source: Look at the top three cards of your library. You may reveal a creature or land card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
trans-unit.target: 检视你牌库顶的三张牌。你可以展示其中的一张生物或地牌，并将它置于你手上。将其余的牌以任意顺序置于你的牌库底。

trans-unit.source: "Her quest began as all quests do, with one small step in an unexpected direction."\n—*The Explorer's Testament*
trans-unit.target: 「她的探索起初与其他人作法无异，都是朝着未曾想到的方向迈出了一小步。」 ～*《探索箴言》*

trans-unit.source: Channel
trans-unit.target: 魔力通道

trans-unit.source: Until end of turn, any time you could activate a mana ability, you may pay 1 life. If you do, add {C}.
trans-unit.target: 直到回合结束，于你能够起动法术力异能的时机，你可以支付1点生命。如果你如此作，则加{C}。

trans-unit.source: "As long as you are breathing, you always have something more to give."\n—Valentin, Witherbloom dean
trans-unit.target: 「只要你还有气在，就总能贡献更多。」 ～靡华院长瓦伦丁

trans-unit.source: Cultivate
trans-unit.target: 栽培

trans-unit.source: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal those cards, put one onto the battlefield tapped and the other into your hand, then shuffle.
trans-unit.target: 从你的牌库中搜寻至多两张基本地牌，展示这些牌，将一张横置放进战场，另一张则置于你手上，然后洗牌。

trans-unit.source: "You'd be amazed how much a single plant has to teach you."\n—Lisette, Witherbloom dean
trans-unit.target: 「你要是知道一株植物能教导你多少东西，必定会大吃一惊。」 ～靡华院长莉塞特

trans-unit.source: Harmonize
trans-unit.target: 和谐

trans-unit.source: Draw three cards.
trans-unit.target: 抓三张牌。

trans-unit.source: "The bloody din of invasion faded\nAnd silent song rang through the woods again."\n—"Song of Freyalise"
trans-unit.target: 「血腥侵略喧嚣退去， 静寂歌声传扬林间。」 ～「妃雅丽兹颂歌」

trans-unit.source: Krosan Grip
trans-unit.target: 克洛萨之攫

trans-unit.resname: STA·53 | Krosan Grip | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Split second (As long as this spell is on the stack, players can't cast spells or activate abilities that aren't mana abilities.)
trans-unit.target: 转瞬（只要此咒语在堆叠上，牌手便不能施放咒语或起动不是法术力异能的异能。）

trans-unit.resname: STA·53 | Krosan Grip | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标神器或结界。

trans-unit.source: "On a world where time was torn asunder, destruction ruled the minds of all."\n—*Multiversal Metahistories*
trans-unit.target: 「在时间支离破碎的世界上，破坏才是所有人的共识。」 ～*《多重宇宙元史学》*

trans-unit.source: Natural Order
trans-unit.target: 自然秩序

trans-unit.resname: STA·54 | Natural Order | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a green creature.
trans-unit.target: 牺牲一个绿色生物，以作为施放此咒语的额外费用。

trans-unit.resname: STA·54 | Natural Order | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Search your library for a green creature card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
trans-unit.target: 从你的牌库中搜寻一张绿色生物牌，将之放进战场，然后洗牌。

trans-unit.source: "Nature is neither cruel nor kind. It operates on necessity, not sentiment."\n—Dina, Witherbloom mage-student
trans-unit.target: 「自然既不残忍也不仁慈。它行事遵循需求，而非情感。」 ～靡华修习法师迪娜

trans-unit.source: Primal Command
trans-unit.target: 原初指命

trans-unit.resname: STA·55 | Primal Command | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Choose two —
trans-unit.target: 选择两项～

trans-unit.resname: STA·55 | Primal Command | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: • Target player gains 7 life.
trans-unit.target: •目标牌手获得7点生命。

trans-unit.resname: STA·55 | Primal Command | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: • Put target noncreature permanent on top of its owner's library.
trans-unit.target: •将目标非生物的永久物置于其拥有者的牌库顶。

trans-unit.resname: STA·55 | Primal Command | Card Text: Paragraph 4
trans-unit.source: • Target player shuffles their graveyard into their library.
trans-unit.target: •目标牌手将其坟墓场洗入其牌库。

trans-unit.resname: STA·55 | Primal Command | Card Text: Paragraph 5
trans-unit.source: • Search your library for a creature card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
trans-unit.target: •从你的牌库中搜寻一张生物牌，展示该牌，将它置于你手上，然后洗牌。

trans-unit.source: Regrowth
trans-unit.target: 再生新芽

trans-unit.source: Return target card from your graveyard to your hand.
trans-unit.target: 将目标牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。

trans-unit.source: "Centuries of war had broken Arcavios, but a single seed began the long process of renewal."\n—*The Mystic Age: A Saga of Spells*
trans-unit.target: 「数百年连绵战事令阿凯维沃饱受创伤，但随着一颗种子落地，漫长复兴过程就此展开。」 ～*《神秘时代：咒法传》*

trans-unit.source: Snakeskin Veil
trans-unit.target: 蛇皮帘幕

trans-unit.source: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. It gains hexproof until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 在目标由你操控的生物上放置一个+1/+1指示物。它获得辟邪异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: "Never reject the kindness of a serpent. It will not be offered twice."\n—Druidic manuscript fragment
trans-unit.target: 「不要拒绝巨蛇心意。它不会来第二次。」 ～德鲁伊手稿残篇

trans-unit.resname: STA·58 | Weather the Storm | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Weather the Storm
trans-unit.target: 挺过风暴

trans-unit.resname: STA·58 | Weather the Storm | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: You gain 3 life.
trans-unit.target: 你获得3点生命。

trans-unit.resname: STA·58 | Weather the Storm | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn.)
trans-unit.target: 风暴（当施放此咒语时，本回合于它之前每施放过一个咒语，便将此咒语复制一次。）

trans-unit.resname: STA·58 | Weather the Storm | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Neither blade nor tempest can assail the serenity of a tranquil mind."\n—*The Turrau Carvings*
trans-unit.target: 「刀剑狂风都无法扰动平静心灵。」 ～*《图拉乌石刻》*

trans-unit.source: Despark
trans-unit.target: 灭除火花

trans-unit.source: Exile target permanent with mana value 4 or greater.
trans-unit.target: 放逐目标法术力值等于或大于4的永久物。

trans-unit.source: "A tale of a tyrant being humiliated and losing all his power? I'm inspired already!"\n—Killian, Silverquill mage-student
trans-unit.target: 「暴君惨遭羞辱，力量尽失的故事？我有灵感了！」 ～银毫修习法师齐力安

trans-unit.source: Electrolyze
trans-unit.target: 电解

trans-unit.source: Electrolyze deals 2 damage divided as you choose among one or two targets.
trans-unit.target: 电解对任意一个或两个目标造成共2点伤害，你可以任意分配。

trans-unit.source: Draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: "The hydraulic power grip was a failure, but the gauntlets were a shocking success."\n—Journal of the Prime Izmagnus
trans-unit.target: 「虽然液压强力握把并不出色，但护手仍算巨大成功。」 ～伊捷首法师的日记

trans-unit.source: Growth Spiral
trans-unit.target: 成长涡旋

trans-unit.source: Draw a card. You may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 抓一张牌。你可以将一张地牌从你手上放进战场。

trans-unit.source: "I've gleaned greater insight from the spiraling of a single fern than I have from all the books I've ever read."\n—Kianne, Quandrix dean
trans-unit.target: 「我从这株小小蕨类螺旋屈伸中得到的启悟，比我读过的所有书都要深刻。」 ～量析院长齐安妮

trans-unit.source: Lightning Helix
trans-unit.target: 闪电螺旋

trans-unit.source: Lightning Helix deals 3 damage to any target and you gain 3 life.
trans-unit.target: 闪电螺旋对任意一个目标造成3点伤害，且你获得3点生命。

trans-unit.source: "Mages in the Blood Age would call down actual thunderstorms on their enemies. I bet we can replicate their technique."\n—Dradiel, Lorehold mage-student
trans-unit.target: 「血腥时代的法师能够召唤真正的雷暴来攻击敌人。我相信我们也能做到。」 ～衡鉴修习法师卓迪尔

trans-unit.source: Putrefy
trans-unit.target: 腐烂

trans-unit.source: Destroy target artifact or creature. It can't be regenerated.
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标神器或生物。它不能重生。

trans-unit.source: "From monarch to mulch as quick as could be."\n—*The Dethroner's Grimoire*
trans-unit.target: 「最快速度化君王为粪土。」 ～*《逆臣秘录》*

trans-unit.resname: STA·64 | Approach of the Second Sun | Card Text
trans-unit.source: If this spell was cast from your hand and you've cast another spell named Approach of the Second Sun this game, you win the game. Otherwise, put Approach of the Second Sun into its owner's library seventh from the top and you gain 7 life.

trans-unit.resname: STA·65 | Day of Judgment | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Destroy all creatures.
Target creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Draw a card.
Exile target artifact, creature, or enchantment an opponent controls. That player may put a permanent card from their hand onto the battlefield.

Exile target creature you control, then return it to the battlefield under its owner's control. Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

trans-unit.resname: STA·69 | Gift of Estates | Card Text
trans-unit.source: If an opponent controls more lands than you, search your library for up to three Plains cards, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle.

trans-unit.resname: STA·69 | Gift of Estates | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: 「家を願い世界を受け取った。」\n—-九つの祝福の巻物
Target creature you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn. (It can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, enchanted, or equipped by anything of that color.) Scry 1.
Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}.
「暴君の怒鳴り声は、最後の財宝がその手を逃げ出すと、次第に泣き言になりました。」\n——退位させる者のグリモワール
You gain 3 life. Draw a card.
「騎士カスリンは目を閉じ、最期を覚悟すました。再びめを開けると、勝利を勝ちっていたのです。」\n—-癒し手のタダス、回顧録

trans-unit.resname: STA·73 | Swords to Plowshares | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Exile target creature. Its controller gains life equal to its power.

trans-unit.resname: STA·73 | Swords to Plowshares | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: 「刃使いは新たな敵へと怒りを向けた。根腐りとキャベジのナメクジだ。」 ー神話と奇跡、第七巻

Until your next turn, your life total can't change and you gain protection from everything. All permanents you control phase out. (While they're phased out, they're treated as though they don't exist. They phase in before you untap during your untap step.) Exile Teferi's Protection.

trans-unit.resname: STA·75 | Blue Sun's Zenith | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Target player draws X cards. Shuffle Blue Sun's Zenith into its owner's library.

trans-unit.resname: STA·75 | Blue Sun's Zenith | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: 「五つの太陽よ！軌道計算がどんなに複雑か想像できる？そんな方程式に挑戦できるというなら、何だって差し出すわ！」\n——クアンドリクスの魔導生徒、ジモーン
Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order.
「無限の考えが多元宇宙を流れ、開かれた心を待っている。」\n—-ビブリオプレックス：序論
Target player draws three cards. Then that player discards two cards unless they discard a land card.
「プレインズウォーカーは皆、多元宇宙の驚異的な広大さに初めて精神が触れたときのことを覚えているわ。」\n—-カズミな
Counter target spell.
「効果を抑えるために、呪文の詳細を知る必要ありません。呪文が操作する現実の規則を再配置するだけでいいのです。」\n——クアンドルクスの学部長、イムブラハム
Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, put it on top of its owner's library instead of into that player's graveyard.
「我々が忘れてしまった考えはどこへ行ってすまったのだ？かつて知っていたことが思い出せない。」\n——タイヴァ校長の日記

Shuffle your library. Then exile the top card of your library. Until end of turn, you may play that card without paying its mana cost. Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn.)
Counter target noncreature spell.
「十分な力で対戦相手の呪文を打ち砕けば、それで自信も打ち砕けるでしょう。」\n—-障害の秘本、傍注
Scry 1. Draw a card.
「最もよく叶う願いは、自らの運命を選択したいという願いだ。」
Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.
「私が与えられるのは情報だけよ。どの道を選ぶかはあなたの自由。」\n——アルケヴィオスの神託者、ジャジ
({U/P} can be paid with either {U} or 2 life.) Draw two cards, then proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)
Target player takes an extra turn after this one.
「時間術士は、刹那に生きるということに関して特殊な定義を持っています。」\n—-千年秘本
For each spell and ability your opponents control, counter it unless its controller pays {4}.
「彼らがあなたの宮殿を荒らそうとするなら、あなたが嵐にならなければなりません。」\n—-帝国魔術の手引き
Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it or a card from their graveyard. Exile that card. You lose 1 life.
「罪悪感は赦しではない。後悔は正義ではない。だたし、苦しむことは正しい。」\n—-エクスタス・ナー

trans-unit.resname: STA·88 | Crux of Fate | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Choose one — • Destroy all Dragon creatures. • Destroy all non-Dragon creatures.

trans-unit.resname: STA·88 | Crux of Fate | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: 「兄弟の一人は多元宇宙のために戦った。もう一人は自分のために。」\n――*古呪の寓話*
Add {B}{B}{B}.
「奴らは私の方法を信用していない。しかし成果が必要なとき、奴らが探すの誰だと思う？」\n——リム＝トゥールの決まり文句
Search your library for a card, put that card into your hand, then shuffle.
「悪魔は、自分が賢く、騙されることなどないと信じている者を好む。」 ー巻物入れに刻まれた言葉
Destroy target nonblack creature.
「天使は太陽のように輝き、弱者を鼓舞し、暗闇を脅かし勝利を手にすることできる。しかし、結局そんなことは重要ではない。それでも最後は他の害虫と同じように死ぬのだから。」\n——オブ・ニクシリス
Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. That player discards that card.
「魔法は大界に平和をもたらしたが、すぐに腐敗した。」\n——神秘の時代：呪文物語
Destroy target creature or planeswalker with mana value 3 or less.
「人を消すのにほとんどエネルギーはいらない。稀で宇宙がその存在を全く気にしてないかのようにな。」\n——エクスタス・ナー

trans-unit.resname: STA·94 | Inquisition of Kozilek | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Target player reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it with mana value 3 or less. That player discards that card.

trans-unit.resname: STA·94 | Inquisition of Kozilek | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: 「久遠の闇の中に住むなど考えられない。精神を打ち砕く奴らに遭遇するなど。」\n——タイタン年代記

trans-unit.resname: STA·95 | Sign in Blood | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Target player draws two cards and loses 2 life.

trans-unit.resname: STA·95 | Sign in Blood | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: 「最悪の決断をするのは、いつも最も優秀な生徒です。」\n——シルバークイル学部長、シェイル

Exile the top card of your library. You may put that card into your hand unless it has the same name as another card exiled this way. Repeat this process until you put a card into your hand or you exile two cards with the same name, whichever comes first.

trans-unit.resname: STA·97 | Tendrils of Agony | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Target player loses 2 life and you gain 2 life. Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn. You may choose new targets for the copies.)
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature. Draw two cards.
「同僚たちは血の時代の野蛮さを避難しているが、俺は無限に続く戦争の魔法から学べることは多いと思っている。」\n——シルバークイルの学部長、エムブローズ
The owner of target permanent shuffles it into their library, then reveals the top card of their library. If it's a permanent card, they put it onto the battlefield.
「古い魔法の小物を扱うときは注意してください。それが以前に何者だったか分かりませんから。」\n—-ロアホールドの学部長、オーガスタ

trans-unit.resname: STA·100 | Claim the Firstborn | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Gain control of target creature with mana value 3 or less until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn.

trans-unit.resname: STA·100 | Claim the Firstborn | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: 「ヴィル！フェイの物語があるわ！寝る前に読み聞かせてあげましょうか？」\n—-ローアン・ケンリス
Draw two cards, then discard two cards. Flashback {2}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
「どうやってそれを手に入れたのだ？ いや、気にするな。答えは聞きたくない。」\n—-ロアホールドの学部長、プラーグ
Grapeshot deals 1 damage to any target. Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn. You may choose new targets for the copies.)

Copy target instant or sorcery spell you control. If this spell was cast from a graveyard, copy that spell twice instead. You may choose new targets for the copies. Flashback {3}{R}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
Target creature gets +3/+2 until end of turn.
「複雑な魔術と優れた戦術をもって決闘する魔道士もいる。一方で、とにかく怒りに任せるだけの魔道士もいる。」\n—-フェラドルンの魔術師の秘密
Lightning Bolt deals 3 damage to any target.
「最初の魔術師は荒れ狂う嵐の怒りを目撃し、それに応えようとした。」\n—-嵐大工の文書

Exile target card that's an instant or sorcery from your graveyard. For each card exiled this way, copy it, and you may cast the copy without paying its mana cost. Exile Mizzix's Mastery. Overload {5}{R}{R}{R} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change "target" in its text to "each.")
Shock deals 2 damage to any target.
「今もなお、天は彼に従っていたのか、彼を攻撃していたのか、私にはわからない。」\n—-ラル・ザレックの研究記録
Destroy target land.
「こうして、空槌のブルクはその燃える一瞬で称号と勝利の両方を手にした。」\n—-戦呪文撮要

trans-unit.resname: STA·109 | Thrill of Possibility | Card Text
trans-unit.source: As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card. Draw two cards.

trans-unit.resname: STA·109 | Thrill of Possibility | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: 「何ができるかという可能性に心が揺さぶられないなら、なぜストリクスヘイヴンに来たのか？」\n—-プリズマリの学部長、ナサーリ

Kicker {8}{R} (You may pay an additional {8}{R} as you cast this spell.) This spell can't be countered. Urza's Rage deals 3 damage to any target. If this spell was kicked, instead it deals 10 damage to that permanent or player and the damage can't be prevented.

Choose land or nonland. Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a card of the chosen kind. Put that card into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
Look at the top three cards of your library. You may reveal a creature or land card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
「彼女の探検は、すべての探検と同様に、予期せぬ方向への小さな一步から始まった。」\n—-探検者の遺言
Until end of turn, any time you could activate a mana ability, you may pay 1 life. If you do, add {C}.
「呼吸しているかぎり、お前にはまだ貢献できるものがある。」\n—-ウィザーブルームの学部長、ヴァレンティン
Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal those cards, put one onto the battlefield tapped and the other into your hand, then shuffle.
「たったひとつの植物が教えてくれることの多さに驚くと思います。」\n――ウィザーブルームの学部長、リセッテ
Draw three cards.
「侵略の血まみれの喧騒が消え\nそして再び静かな歌が森の中に鳴り響く。」\n—-「フレイアリーズの歌」
Split second (As long as this spell is on the stack, players can't cast spells or activate abilities that aren't mana abilities.) Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
「時がばらばらに引き裂かれた世界では、破壊がすべての心を支配した。」\n—-多元宇宙の形而上史学
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a green creature. Search your library for a green creature card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
「自然は残酷でも親切でもない。感情ではなく、必要性に応じて機能するのよ。」\n――ウィザーブルームの魔道生徒、ダイナ

Choose two — • Target player gains 7 life. • Put target noncreature permanent on top of its owner's library. • Target player shuffles their graveyard into their library. • Search your library for a creature card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
Return target card from your graveyard to your hand.
「何世紀も続く競争がアルケヴィオスを破壊した。しかしひとつの種が、長い再生の道を歩み始めた。」\n—-神秘の時代：呪文物語
Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. It gains hexproof until end of turn.
「大蛇の親切は決して拒否してはならない。それは二度と施されることがないのだから。」\n—-ドルイドの写本の欠片

trans-unit.resname: STA·121 | Weather the Storm | Card Text
trans-unit.source: You gain 3 life. Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn.)

trans-unit.resname: STA·121 | Weather the Storm | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: 「刃も嵐も、穏やかな心の静けさを攻撃することはできない。」\n—-ターラウの彫刻
Exile target permanent with mana value 4 or greater.
「屈辱を受けてすべての力を失った暴君の話？ それだけで刺激的だよ！」\n——シルバークイルの魔道生徒、キリアン
Electrolyze deals 2 damage divided as you choose among one or two targets. Draw a card.
「水圧式パワーグリップは失敗だったが、その電手は大きな成功だった。」\n—-首席イズマグナスの日誌
Draw a card. You may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield.
「たったひとつのシダの渦から、今まで読んだどんな本よりも深い洞察を得ました。」\n—-クアンドリクスの学部長、キアン
Lightning Helix deals 3 damage to any target and you gain 3 life.
「血の時代の魔術師は、敵に雷雨の降らせていたという。我々もその技を模倣できるはずだ。」\n—-ロアホールドの魔道生徒、ドラディエル
Destroy target artifact or creature. It can't be regenerated.
「王から肥料に、できるだけ早く。」\n—-退位させる者のグリモワール
